definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Shizhu Tujia autonomous county in Qianjiang suburbs of Chongqing municipality
Shizhu Tujia Autonomous County in Qianjiang suburbs of Chongqing municipality
pinyin: Shi2 zhu4 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: lit. the dragon-fly shakes the stone tower (idiom); fig. to overestimate one's capabilities

sentences.english: There is a dragon engraved around the stone pillar.
Cultists cummoning in gigantic, fat demon who's shock waves shatter stone pillars in the environment.
sentences.chinese: 邪恶教徒巨大化后可以用冲击波击碎环境中石柱。

sentences.english: There are also two columns of massive stone pillars outside the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 在大门外面，有很多石柱排成了两队。

sentences.english: A tourist walks through snow-covered stelae at the Memorial to the Murdered Jews of Europe, also known as the Holocaust Memorial on December 2, 2010 in Berlin, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 一观光者在欧洲被害犹太人纪念碑的石柱中穿行。

sentences.english: Everything had disappeared except me. I still stood there like a weathered stone pillar.
sentences.chinese: 一切都没有了，只有我还站着，像一根风华的石柱。

sentences.english: This "lotus flower" is sustained by four elaborate stelae and a square stone foundation.
sentences.chinese: “莲花”由四根精雕细琢的石柱支撑，方型石础。

sentences.english: The stone pillar and winding road we just passed.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚才经过的石柱和飘带般的机车道。

sentences.english: The stone pillar has a decorating spiral stripe .
sentences.chinese: 这根石柱有一条螺线的装饰条纹。

sentences.english: Snow flying almost crashed into the stone pillars, thanks to Carrie had hand blocking for her in time.
sentences.chinese: 雪飞差点儿撞向石柱，幸得嘉仪及时用手替她挡住。

sentences.english: In about 2300 BC the huge stone circles were built.
sentences.chinese: 大约公元前2300年巨石柱修建而成。

sentences.english: Jacob set up a stone pillar at the place where God had talked with him, and he poured out a drink offering on it; he also poured oil on it.
sentences.chinese: 雅各便在那里立了一根石柱，在柱子上祭酒，浇油。

sentences.english: Inside the circle made by the ditch stand stone pillar and crossbeams weighing up to 45 tons.
sentences.chinese: 在挖掘出的圆坑里竖立着重达45吨的石柱和横梁。

sentences.english: And Jacob set up a pillar in the place where he talked with him, even a pillar of stone: and he poured a drink offering thereon, and he poured oil thereon.
sentences.chinese: 雅各便在那里立了一根石柱，在柱子上奠酒，浇油。

sentences.english: The remaining pillars at the gates are carved with pictures of a snake or snakes.
sentences.chinese: 门前这些残留的石柱上所雕刻的除了蛇还是蛇。

sentences.english: Shizhu Peak is not new to travelers from Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 对于长沙的驴友，石柱峰区域并不陌生。

sentences.english: She strove to read the name on the stone pillar.
sentences.chinese: 她费劲地读着石柱上的名字。

definition: Shimen or Shihmen township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Shitai county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui
